Conversation/CantinaTosh/Line00127=暗杀只能使我荣升为烈士。那就没办法抹掉我的影响。他想要我身败名裂。 /// Assassinating me'd just turn me into a martyr. (chuckles) He'd never be rid of me then. He needs to kill my reputation first. 
Conversation/CantinaTosh/Line00128=非常好。仇恨并没有让你失去冷静。不过他的耐心也是有限的。小心，雷诺先生。直觉告诉我，这艘船上有蒙斯克安插的内鬼。 /// Very good. You think clearly despite your hate for him. 'Course his patience has got limits too. Tread careful, Mr. Raynor. Someone on this ship is already working for Mengsk. I can feel it. 
Conversation/CantinaTosh/Line00132=你在下面发现的东西让我胆寒。那到底是什么？ /// Whatever you found down there makes me afraid. What was it?

Conversation/Debriefs/Comment00006=--- These next lines are playback from Terran 8 in SC1. As these lines play we cut to Raynor's face  (with a slow push in) as he listens, shocked and cut back to the adjutant to show her speaking in different voices. Conversation/InstallerText/Group00001=Installer Text /// Installer Text
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00001=几世纪以前，四艘地球的囚舰偏离了航道，驶入了遥远的科普卢星区。随后坠毁在塔桑尼斯、莫瑞亚和尤摩扬星球上。 /// Centuries ago four prison ships from Earth veered off course and journeyed deep into the remote Koprulu sector. There they crash-landed on the planets of Tarsonis, Moria, and Umoja.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00002=与地球失去联系的幸存者们在星区内建立了若干个移民地。最大的移民地，塔桑尼斯，由强大却日渐专制的联邦政府建立。 /// Cut off from Earth, the survivors established colonies throughout the sector. The largest, Tarsonis, was founded by a powerful yet increasingly oppressive government called the Confederacy.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00003=面对政府骇人听闻的种种暴行，阿克图尔斯·蒙斯克成立了名为“克哈之子”的起义军组织。他们将推翻联邦政府、解放星区视为己任。 /// Spurred by the terrible acts of this government, Arcturus Mengsk formed the Sons of Korhal. This rebel army fought to overthrow the Confederacy and liberate the Koprulu sector.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00004=正当蒙斯克和他麾下的起义军斗士们奋力推翻腐败的联邦政府时，更大的威胁却悄然逼近人类。 /// Even as Mengsk and his resistance fighters fought to overthrow the corrupt Confederacy, a much greater threat confronted the terrans.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00005=大批外星战舰将联邦星球乔·萨拉团团包围。这群自称星灵的外星生物将乔·萨拉星球表面一切焚毁殆尽，之后神秘撤离。 /// Without warning, massive alien warships appeared and surrounded the Confederate planet of Chau Sara. Calling themselves protoss, the aliens incinerated the planet's surface and then mysteriously withdrew.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00006=星球被一种名为异虫的恐怖外星生物所感染，它们威胁要吞噬人类的领区，但星灵却要在异虫得逞前将其根除。 /// The planet had been infested by another type of alien: the zerg. These monstrous creatures threatened to overwhelm terran space, and the protoss sought to eradicate them before they spread.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00007=异虫已经抵达了玛·萨拉，联邦政府任由当地住民自生自灭，指挥官吉姆·雷诺挺身而出，肩负起拯救民众的重任。 /// The zerg had already reached the neighboring planet, Mar Sara, and Marshal Jim Raynor fought to save the terrified colonists as the Confederate government abandoned them to the alien menace.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00008=“克哈之子”介入其中，从异虫和星灵手中救出了上万条生命。对联邦政府极度失望的雷诺加入了起义军，并遇到了莎拉·凯瑞甘。 /// The Sons of Korhal intervened, saving thousands of lives from the rampaging zerg and enigmatic protoss. Disgusted by the Confederacy, Raynor joined the rebels and met Sarah Kerrigan.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00009=凯瑞甘曾是联邦的一名幽灵特工，她与雷诺都希望星区能够得到解放。随着起义的不断升级，他们渐渐成了默契的派档。 /// Kerrigan was a former Confederate ghost operative, and she shared Raynor's desire for a liberated Koprulu sector. They grew close as the battle with the Confederacy escalated.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00010=但蒙斯克渐渐被自己的仇恨和野心吞没。他在塔桑尼斯安放了灵能发射源，吸引异虫蜂拥而至，毁灭整个星球。 /// But Mengsk went too far in his hatred and ambition. He ordered devices placed on the Confederate capital world of Tarsonis to lure the zerg and annihilate the population.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00011=星灵在执行官塔萨达尔的率领下，决定协助人类对抗异虫，拯救塔桑尼斯。然而蒙斯克却派凯瑞甘前去阻止这次行动。 /// The protoss, led by Executor Tassadar, decided to help the Terrans defeat the zerg instead of purging the planet of life. Mengsk sent Kerrigan to stop Tassadar's interference.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00012=凯瑞甘对星灵的阻击，使整个塔桑尼斯被虫群毁灭，星球上生物也被屠戮殆尽。蒙斯克却转身离开，将凯瑞甘遗弃给了虫群。 /// With Kerrigan battling the protoss, the zerg overwhelmed Tarsonis and decimated the population. Having achieved his goals, Mengsk left the planet and abandoned Kerrigan to the aliens.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00013=蒙斯克的背叛令雷诺愤怒不已，他毅然离开“克哈之子”，想要去塔桑尼斯营救凯瑞甘，但凯瑞甘早已沦为异虫的俘虏。 /// Sickened by Mengsk's treachery, Raynor quit the Sons of Korhal. He raced to the planet's surface to save Kerrigan, but was too late: no trace of her remained.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00014=随着联邦政府的倒台，蒙斯克成立了全新的泰伦帝国，并将自己加冕为王。泰伦帝国比起先前的政府却更加腐败。 /// Having destroyed the Confederacy, Mengsk crowned himself emperor of the newly formed Terran Dominion; a government that would prove to be just as corrupt as its predecessor.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00015=雷诺为凯瑞甘的离去感到无比心痛，并发誓为她报仇。但出乎意料的是，凯瑞甘没有死。相反，她被虫群带到了火山星球——查尔。 /// Raynor mourned the loss of Kerrigan and vowed revenge. Unbeknownst to him, however, the zerg hadn't killed Kerrigan. Instead, they took her to the volcanic planet of Char.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00016=在查尔星球上，凯瑞甘被变为了外星生物“刀锋女王”。她拥有了无比强大的灵能，并效忠于虫群的统治者——主宰。 /// On Char, Kerrigan was transformed into the alien Queen of Blades. She became a being of immense psionic power, loyal to the Overmind, ruler of the zerg Swarm.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00017=除了塔萨达尔的星灵军队外，另一支潜于暗影之中的星灵也加入了战斗。泽拉图和他麾下的黑暗圣堂武士们在悄无声息地利用虚空能量阻止虫群的扩张。 /// Separate from Tassadar's forces, another protoss faction emerged from the shadows. Zeratul and his dark templar sought to end the zerg expansion through stealth and the power of the Void.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00018=尽管这两股星灵力量携手对抗虫群，但主宰还是发现了星灵的秘密家园“艾尔”。虫群向艾尔发动了侵略，主宰将自身植入了星球表面。 /// The two protoss forces joined together against the Swarm, but the Overmind was able to discover their secret homeworld of Aiur. The zerg quickly invaded, and the Overmind embedded itself in the planet's surface.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00019=塔萨达尔通过泽拉图得知了将虚空能量与自身能量结合的方法。他将虚空能量注入舰船，然后毅然撞向了凶残的主宰，与其同归于尽。 /// Zeratul taught Tassadar how to combine his powers with those of the Void.  Tassadar fused those energies into his ship, and crashed it into the gargantuan Overmind, destroying it utterly.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00020=虽然塔萨达尔牺牲了自己，但艾尔的星灵还是被迫逃往黑暗圣堂武士的家园“萨古拉斯”。面对失去首脑的虫群，凯瑞甘成为了最高统治者。 /// Despite Tassadar's sacrifice, the protoss on Aiur were forced to seek refuge on the dark templar homeworld of Shakuras. With the Overmind destroyed, Kerrigan assumed control of the zerg.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00021=雷诺发动了推翻帝国政府的革命。而蒙斯克利用他最为强大的武器——宣传——来使雷诺的努力化为乌有，并将其描绘成一个恐怖分子…… /// Raynor began a resistance movement against the oppressive Dominion. In retaliation, Mengsk deployed his greatest weapon -- propaganda -- to marginalize Raynor's efforts and paint him as a terrorist.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00022=一转眼四年过去了。凯瑞甘和虫群仍然没有任何消息。与此同时，帝国不断壮大，整个科普卢星区都落入了它的掌握。 /// It is now four years later. Kerrigan and the zerg have remained ominously silent. Meanwhile, the Dominion has grown in power and extended its influence throughout the Koprulu sector.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00023=尽管雷诺和他的军队士气低迷、资源匮乏，却仍在不懈地斗争。只不过想要推翻蒙斯克似乎越发遥不可及…… /// Raynor and his forces, plagued by low morale and lack of resources, continue their struggle against the Dominion. Victory against Mengsk, however, seems more distant than ever....

Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00007=我们用血汗换来了这神器……现在交给瓦伦里安，希望他能造出超级武器来制止凯瑞甘。 /// All that sweat and blood getting the artifacts... Now we've given them away to Valerian so he can build a super weapon to stop Kerrigan.
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00008=奶奶的，但愿能管用，否则我的脑袋就真进水了。 /// Hell, this had better work or I'm just the dumbest jackass alive.
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00009=你能给我介绍下这个神器吗？我得承认……我被它搞糊涂了。 /// Can you tell me anything about this artifact? I gotta admit... it kinda weirds me out.
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00010=这东西真有趣，指挥官。初步分析显示其能量信号的辐射强度比任何有记载的外星遗物都要强10倍。 /// It really is fascinating, Commander. Preliminary analysis suggests that its energy signature radiates at ten times the magnitude of any previously recorded alien antiquities. 
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00011=喔，好吧——别不当回事，斯台特曼。搞不好它会弄开个黑洞，把船一口吞进去…… /// Yeah, well -- don't start pickin' at it, Stetmann. With our luck, it'd probably just open up a black hole and swallow the ship....
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00012=天哪，我可没把这种可能性算进去…… /// Goodness, I hadn't factored the odds of that potentiality... 
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00013=指挥官，我一直在琢磨这些神器…… /// Oh -- Commander, Commander, Commander. I've been giving these artifacts some thought...
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00014=呃——别担心——我还没分析过它们或干过别的！没直接进行过…… /// Oh -- don't worry -- I know what you're gonna say -- I haven't been running diagnostics on them or anything! Well, at least not directly, at any rate...
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00015=有话就说，小子。 /// Just spit it out, son.

The ambient containment field spiked drastically. Hm, I know. If we add any more pieces, we'll need to draw even more power from the ship's fusion core to maintain the field.

Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00020=斯台特曼， 局势混乱，我没空操这个闲心。只要能顺利交给那群莫比斯人，拿到工钱就行了。 /// With everything else going on, Stetmann, I couldn't care less what they do, just that we get paid when we finally hand 'em over to the Moebius boys.

Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00023=从统计学来看，长官——这种巧合的概率是微乎其微的。但这些神器的确超越了我们目前对科学的理解…… /// Statistically, sir -- the probability of coincidence is miniscule. However, these artifacts do represent a power beyond our current scientific understanding... 
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00024=要是有东西能阻止刀锋女王——就是这神器了？ /// If anything could the give the Queen of Blades pause - perhaps these are it?

Your artifact is a few thousand years old, but that makes it pretty 'young' in Xeno-archaelogical terms. Most alien artifacts are millions of years old. By comparison, this one was made recently.
Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00027=根据我的经验，这不像是星灵造的。但如果不是他们……那会是谁呢？ /// It ain't like anything protoss I've ever seen. But if they didn't make it... who did?

Conversation/LabFidgetsArtifact/Line00029=……能让她回到我的身边。 /// ...these things bring her back to me.

Conversation/Mercscreentutorial/Line00001=你可以签订雇佣兵契约来扩充兵力。在任务中建造佣兵港即可支配一个雇佣兵组织，当然需要消耗一定的资源。雇佣兵会即刻到位，并在剩下的任务时间里听你指挥。 /// You can buy mercenary contracts to bolster your forces. To deploy a mercenary group during a mission build a Merc Haven and then pay the requisite resource cost. The mercenaries deploy immediately and remain under your command for the rest of the mission.
Conversation/Mercscreentutorial/Line00002=当你与某雇佣兵组织签订了契约，这些雇佣兵在整场战役中都将听从你的调遣，无需支付额外费用。每个任务结束后，雇佣兵会免费补充那些阵亡的单位。 /// Once you contract a mercenary group to fight for you they are yours for the whole campaign, no additional payments need to be made. After each mission mercenaries will replace any units lost in combat for free.

ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description=<s val="Lab_Text">雷诺的游骑兵们找回的星灵“水晶”样本，2504年10月7日。<n/><n/>我把水晶存放在了盐水溶液里。在过去的12小时内，它的密度增加了553%。在什么都没有的情况下，它是怎么做到的？我有一种不安的猜测……它很可能与舰船有着某种连结。要是引起斯旺的怀疑，他肯定会把它从气闸扔出去，那就太悲剧了。这样本可能会成为游骑兵军事战斗的重要突破点。<n/> <n/>小心点儿就行了，如果有任何迹象表明这样本会给休伯利安号造成危害，我就会亲自摧毁它。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Protoss "crystal" sample recovered by Raynor's Raiders, 10.7.2504.<n/><n/>I placed the crystal in saline solution for storage. Its density has increased 553% in the last twelve hours. Where does it get energy or raw materials for that? I have a terrible suspicion that it's... connecting to the ship somehow. If Swann suspects, he'll drop it out the airlock, and that would be a tragedy. This sample could lead to huge breakthroughs for the Raiders.<n/> <n/>I just have to be careful, and if there's any sign that it will harm the Hyperion, I'll destroy the crystal myself.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 2=<s val="Lab_Text">水晶还在不断变大，而且像是具有某种……反物质？重力异常？非常规现象？ — 有待进一步确认。我现在非常确信水晶正在从舰船汲取能量，然而汲取的方式非常隐秘，无法被察觉。<n/><n/>它虽然是无机体，但其分子结构的多样化和复杂性却不输于任何有机体。内部生成了错综复杂的矩阵结构，使其整体既坚固又不失韧性。根据该水晶结构熔铸的合金一定能吸收大量伤害。矩阵结构还显示出水晶内部具有某种能量贮存系统。也许有更大的研究空间。<n/><n/>星灵的科技比我们先进太多了。我们在他们眼里想必只能算是单细胞生物。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The crystal is growing, and it appears to have something--some sort of... anti-matter? Gravitational anomaly? Non-standard phenomenon?--hovering over it. I'm now convinced that the crystal is drawing power from the ship, but in ways so subtle as to be undetectable. <n/><n/>It is non-organic but has a molecular structure as diverse and complex as any organism's. It's developed an intricate matrix that makes it tough and surprisingly flexible. An alloy based on this crystal would have impressive damage mitigation. The structure of this matrix also suggests some sort of energy-storage system. There might be something to this.<n/><n/>The protoss are so far beyond us. We must seem amoeboid to them.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 3=<s val="Lab_Text">星灵水晶一直在变大。我已经不再认为它是从舰船汲取能量了。上方那个球体正在源源不断的为它供能 — 这真让人担心。它会聚那么多能量是要干什么呢？难道是要制造爆炸？我决不能让斯旺靠近样本，他肯定会把样本从气闸扔出去，扔之前还会把我绑上。<n/><n/>我原本想刮些小块样本下来，但这玩意儿把我所有工具都弄坏了。好在我从容器里捞出了些样本碎片。谁能告诉我这些碎片是怎么脱落的？不管怎么说，这些碎片又给我提供了更多可供分析的矩阵。它把能量汇集成一个螺旋漩涡。可这些能量怎么能动得这么快？这可能就是传说中星灵的“折跃”技术吧。矩阵的结构极为复杂，坚实程度就连最坚固的建筑物也比不上。嗯，也许我能把这套机制应用到我们自己的建筑物上面？先记下来好了。<n/><n/>我从这块水晶上了解了太多信息，但我总觉得它也在从我这里获取什么 — 如果这能说通的话。太晚了。累了。该睡觉了。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The protoss crystal continues to grow. I no longer think it is drawing power from the ship. It's getting pure energy from that sphere above it, which presents a new worry. What's it doing with all that power? Is it going to release it explosively? I have to keep Swann away from the sample; he will definitely shoot it out the airlock. With me strapped to it.<n/><n/>I tried scraping smaller samples, but all my tools broke. Luckily, I found some cast-off chips floating in the tank. Wonder how they came off? In any case, the chips revealed more of the matrix. It's keeping the energy there in a vortex. How does it move the energy so fast? It may be the fabled protoss warp technology. For all its complexity, the matrix is as solid as the strongest structure. Hm, I wonder if I could apply these dynamics to our own structures? Make a note.<n/><n/>I'm learning so much from this crystal, but I can't help feeling as if it's learning from me, if that makes sense. Late. Tired. Sleep now.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 4=<s val="Lab_Text">我一直在观察水晶上方的那个怪异球体。那显然是个能量发射器，但它的防漏性很好，水晶能通过某种我无法洞悉的方式缓慢地从它身上获取能量。我突然有个灵感：用它强化我们自己的能量防漏技术，就能在不增加额外风险的情况下使SCV的建造能力提升一倍。<n/><n/>突破！这水晶中的能量并不是贮存在螺旋漩涡里，而是以我无法检测到的速度飞快环绕折跃。折跃恰到好处地将速度降至我的感测器可采集的范围——这巧合得难以置信。也不知道是怎么发生的。每当我对这样本的研究达到极限时，瓶颈就会碰巧……被打破……突破接踵而至。<n/><n/>这玩意儿难道是在帮我？看来我已经累到神志不清了，我得花点钱再去打几盘《失落的维京》。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">I've been staring at that anomalous sphere above the crystal. It's obviously an energy emitter, but it has such strong containment that the crystal can slowly draw power from it via some method I don't understand. That gives me an idea: using our own containment technology, I could modify our SCV manufacturing process to double capacity with no increased risk. I think.<n/><n/>Breakthrough! The energy in this crystal is not kept in a vortex pattern. It was warping the energy around so fast that I couldn't detect it. In an odd coincidence, the warping slowed just enough for my sensors to pick it up. Not sure how or why. Every time I reach my wits' end with this sample, something happens by... chance... and I get a breakthrough.<n/><n/>Is it helping me? Clearly I've been working too many hours. I'm going to go lose some more credits on Lost Viking.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 5=<s val="Lab_Text">好吧，我接下来要说的可能已经超出正统科学的范畴了，可我现在清楚的感觉到这水晶有某种……知觉，起码有某种……自动指引性。我昨晚把一个坏了的纳米制造器丢进了容器里，今天捞出来的时候发现已经修好了。而且具备了更为高端的制造能力。我要是能逆向还原出这个制造器的修复过程，就能创造奇迹，实现自动修复，甚至是高级人工智能武器的瞬间生成。这简直是潜力无穷啊。<n/><n/>还有个不那么好的消息——尽管水晶还在不断变大，但贮存在水晶矩阵中的能量根本没有增加。也就是说，它肯定是正在通过某种方式……或某种途径……释放能量。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Okay, I may be exceeding the boundaries of good science, but I am now sure this crystal has some sort of... if not sentience, at least... direction. I put a broken nano-fabricator in the tank last night, and today it's fixed.  And it can accomplish things it shouldn't. If I can reverse engineer this fabricator, I could do amazing things with automated repair, or even near-instant manufacturing of advanced AI weaponry. Possibilities are limitless.<n/><n/>On the less upbeat end of things, the level of energy stored in the crystal's matrix has not increased at all, despite the fact that the crystal continues to grow. So it must be emitting that energy somehow, some... where.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 6=<s val="Lab_Text">我通过研究水晶总结出的关于防漏技术和增强型结构完整性原理已经……嗯……渐趋完善。现在我们也许能把那些从前需要用巨型机器设备封存的能量便捷的存放起来。甚至能造出在可接受压力范围内直接从轨道热着陆的建筑。<n/><n/>真惭愧啊。我其实对这水晶连一丁点儿了解都谈不上。我只不过观察了它的细枝末节，然后拼凑出少得可怜的发现……还是在水晶的帮助下才得以做到。我不明白既然星灵手里有如此高端的技术，怎么还没统治整个宇宙？也许只是因为他们不想吧？<n/><n/>关于这样本的最后一条记录。我终于弄清它把多余的能量用到哪里了。它在为休伯利安号充能。它巧妙的将能量灌注给舰船，维持舰船各个系统的正常运作。它从来的那一刻起就在贡献自己的能量。舰船的理想状态令斯旺兴奋不已，但他想破脑袋也想不出原因。我也不会说给他听。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">All of the containment and reinforced structural integrity theorems I've developed from studying this crystal are starting to... well... crystallize. I think we might be able to contain energies that once required huge machines. Or even manufacture structures capable of hot landings from orbital origins with acceptable stresses.<n/><n/>I'm a sham. I haven't truly learned anything from this crystal. I've just observed the smallest details from it and somehow wrangled a few tidbits when the crystal... helped me. I don't understand how the protoss can possess technology of this magnitude and not rule the known universe. Perhaps they simply don't want to?<n/><n/>Last entry on this sample. I figured out where it is putting all that excess energy. It's feeding the Hyperion. Subtly helping to power the ship, balancing out some of the more ragged systems. It's giving of itself, and has been since it got here. Swann is excited that the ship is running so well, but he has no idea why. And I'm not going to tell him.</s>

ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg=异虫容器 /// Zerg Tank
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/EditorPrefix=实验室 — /// Lab -
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description=<s val="Lab_Text">雷诺的游骑兵找来了一些异虫样本，6.10.2504。<n/><n/>样本拿来时已无生命体征，并出现组织坏死。但实验显示其内部正在出现剧烈细胞活动，而且它正在蠕动。<n/><n/>这颠覆了我对生物学的一贯理解。我正在密切观测于每个细胞内发生的生代剧变。其在上一个小时内的进化要超过人类在过去1万年内的进化成果。<n/><n/>如果我能驾驭它，则将使游骑兵的军事行动产生巨大变革。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Zerg sample recovered by Raynor's Raiders, 6.10.2504.<n/><n/>Sample appeared dead when brought in, including tissue necrosis. However, tests now reveal frantic cellular activity, and it is moving. <n/><n/>This defies everything I understand about biology. I'm tracking massive generational changes in each cell. In the last hour, this thing has evolved more than humans did in 100,000 years.<n/><n/>If I can harness this, it could lead to huge military innovations for the Raiders.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 2=<s val="Lab_Text">游骑兵带回的异虫样本仍在不断变大。我把它泡在了蛋白质溶液里。这也许是个错误。<n/><n/>在细胞层面上，样本显示出所有已知异虫生物的菌株要素 — 以及很多我无法识别的其它菌株。要花些时间才能理清这一切，但我已开始从雷兽细胞中提取数据，还找到了一个可在其本能应激反应机制基础上生成数据的孢子爬虫细胞。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The recovered zerg sample is still growing. I introduced a protein solution. Might have been a mistake.<n/><n/>At the cellular level, the sample shows strains of every known zerg creature--and many other strains that I don't recognize. It will take a while to map it all, but I've already begun extracting data from an ultralisk cell, and I found a spore crawler cell that yielded data on its instinctive threat-recognition routines.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 3=<s val="Lab_Text">游骑兵带回的异虫样本仍在进化。尽管没有类似神经皮层的物质，但它显然具备运动机能。其所发出的热量远超过在容器中可吸收的热量。<n/><n/>我正在研究为什么有些异虫尤其擅长潜地。这极为复杂。它们身上有数以十亿计的微小肌肉，以很低的频率持续振动，可有效疏松土壤、粉碎岩石和破坏植被。它们能在地下自由“游动”。速度虽然比不上跑步，但也差不太多。<n/><n/>我能设法对这一知识大加利用。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Recovered zerg sample continues to evolve. Clearly has motor function despite the lack of anything like a neural cortex. It's giving off more heat than it could possibly be absorbing in that tank.<n/><n/>I'm learning how some zerg burrow so well. It's extremely sophisticated. They have billions of tiny muscles that vibrate at a low frequency, effectively loosening soil, crumbling rock, and snapping vegetation. They can "swim" through the ground. It's not quite as fast as running, but it's close.<n/><n/>I can see a way to put this knowledge to good use.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 4=<s val="Lab_Text">异虫样本已生出一个眼状器官。接下来会长出四肢吗？异虫细胞的分化遵循一个基本规则。A型细胞生出看似随机的变异。B型细胞则负责追踪这些变异并将其消灭。这是细胞层面适者生存原则的体现。成功完成变异的细胞才有蓬勃生长的机会。<n/><n/>我从样本上刮下了一些显微切片，用于验证电能释放力场的实验成果，我在这项实验上已经投入了不少时间。验证结果令人满意。还衍生了一个有趣的副效应 — 异虫物质变成了一种相当致密但又柔韧灵活的物质。可以用这种物质加强大力神级别货船的上层结构，斯旺一直在为那些过时货船寻找新的用武之地。<n/> <n/>我希望能有足够的时间来进一步验证释放力场，并提升硬化物质的应用效果。可时间显然不够用。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The zerg sample has developed an ocular organ. Will limbs be next? There is a basic dichotomy to zerg cell reproduction. Type A cells throw off seemingly random mutations. Type B cells hunt down these mutations and destroy them. It's survival of the fittest on the cellular level. Successful mutations thrive.<n/><n/>I used microscopic scrapings from the sample to test an electrical discharge field I'd been tinkering with for some time. The results were gratifying. As an interesting side effect, the zerg matter developed into a very dense but flexible material. This material could be used to reinforce the superstructure of those old Hercules-class cargo ships that Swann's always trying to find a use for.<n/> <n/>I wish there were time to both pursue the discharge field and iterate on the hardened matter. I doubt there will be.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 5=<s val="Lab_Text">异虫样本生出了一个巨大的神经皮层类物质。我发现它会对外界刺激作出反应，但反应的方式很是令人不安。当它感应到我的存在时，即会停止移动。它难道是在“装死”吗？它已经能作出这么高水平的反应了？<n/><n/>我早些时候还注意到，异虫的阿尔法氨基酸有独特的取代基团。我对其中一些进行了全面实验。结果大大出乎意料。异虫氨基酸能将死去的细胞物质与正常蛋白质结合，并生成新的细胞。这种结合不会受到生代细胞退化规律的影响。简单来说就是，异虫永远不会老死。它们能不断的更新自身细胞，尽管会导致其细胞结构的彻底改变。<n/><n/>我们永远不能将这一发现应用到人类生物学领域 — 结果不言自明，令人不寒而栗。但我在想，是否能将异虫组织合成到我们的某些金属上，从而让建筑具有自动修复伤害的能力？不可避免的，在修复过程也会损失大量能量。但我应该还是能把这部分能量利用起来。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The zerg sample has developed a large neural cortex. I've noticed it reacting to external stimuli, but in a very disturbing way. When it detects my presence, it stops moving. Is it trying to "play dead"? Can it react at that level?<n/><n/>I noticed earlier that zerg alpha amino acids have unique R groups. I've run a full regimen on some. Results are stunning. Zerg aminos are able to combine dead cell matter with normal proteins to biosynthesize new cells. They don't suffer generational cell degradation. Simply put, a zerg will never die of old age. They can constantly renew themselves, albeit with radically changing cell structure.<n/><n/>We could never harness this for biological use with terrans: the results would be foregone and horrifying. But I wonder if I could alloy zerg tissue with some of our metals to make buildings that heal? The renewal process also throws off immense energy as a byproduct. Something there. I should see about harnessing that energy.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 6=<s val="Lab_Text">样本企图逃走，我在培养液里发现了一些新的酸类物质。过不了多久，它们就会破容器而出。不知雷诺指挥官能不能派些陆战队员守在这儿？不 — 他肯定会毁掉它。我对这玩意儿还没研究够呢。<n/><n/>取得突破。我对一些组织应用了西格玛会聚射线，它的生长和移动速度明显减慢。若要做到在战场上安全应用如此大量的射线，还有许多工作要做，但这也许是值得的。<n/><n/>再次取得突破 — 这突破很是恐怖。我对脑细胞的DNA进行了彻底分析，回溯几千年，并将催生异虫主宰的菌株隔离开来。尽管这并不足以克隆主宰，但我可以顺藤摸瓜地研究出它是怎么控制异虫的。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The sample is trying to escape. I've detected several new acids in the nutrient solution. Over time, they will crack the tank. I wonder if Commander Raynor can post some marines down here? No; he'll want to destroy it. I haven't learned everything I can from this thing yet.<n/><n/>Breakthrough. I dosed some tissue with concentrated sigma radiation, and it slowed growth and movement severely. It would take a lot of work to safely deploy that much radiation on the battlefield, but it might be worth it.<n/><n/>Another breakthrough, and this one scares me. I mapped my way through the DNA of some brain tissue, peering back thousands of years, and I isolated the strain from which the zerg Overmind was derived. Not enough to clone the Overmind, but I could follow this strand to gain insight into how it controlled the zerg.</s>

Please note that this upgrade, nicknamed the Planetary Fortress, must be triggered after the Command Center has been built.<n/><n/>Also note that a Command Center that has been upgraded to a Planetary Fortress can no longer lift off because the added weight is far too much for the Command Center's Atlas boosters.</s>

Bunkers can be <c val="FFFF00">Salvaged</c> to return their <c val="FFFF00">Mineral</c> cost if they are no longer needed.

ConversationState/StoryTips/Zeratul01_VoidPrison/Info/Description=<c val="FFFF00">泽拉图</c>能够使用<c val="FFFF00">虚空禁锢</c>技能将单一目标击晕，并使其失去<c val="FFFF00">侦测隐形</c>的能力。<c val="FFFF00">孢子爬虫</c>能够侦测到泽拉图的行踪，该技能对付孢子爬虫十分有效，也同样适合用来对抗<c val="FFFF00">雷兽</c>及<c val="FFFF00">巢虫领主</c>等大型异虫生物。 /// <c val="FFFF00">Zeratul</c> can create a <c val="FFFF00">Void Prison</c> of psionic energy around an enemy, stunning it and suppressing its ability to <c val="FFFF00">Detect.</c> This is useful for killing <c val="FFFF00">Spore Crawlers,</c> which can Detect Zeratul, or for dealing with large Zerg creatures such as <c val="FFFF00">Ultralisks</c> and <c val="FFFF00">Brood Lords.</c>

His <c val="FFFF00">Permanent Cloaking</c> makes him invisible to all but <c val="FFFF00">Detectors</c> like <c val="FFFF00">Spore Crawlers</c> and <c val="FFFF00">Overseers.</c> Centuries of training have made him adept at close-quarters combat.

Colossi are so tall that they can walk up and down cliffs, but they are also vulnerable to attacks from air-to-air units. They do great damage to groups of ground units but cannot target air units. The Colossus is warped in at the <c val="FFFF00">Robotics Facility</c>.
ConversationState/StoryTips/Zeratul03_Observer=侦测器 /// Observer
ConversationState/StoryTips/Zeratul03_Observer/EditorPrefix=Zeratul03 /// Zeratul03
ConversationState/StoryTips/Zeratul03_Observer/Info/Description=侦察飞行器 -- <c val="FFFF00">侦测器</c>是星灵在天空中的眼睛。它们拥有<c val="FFFF00">永久隐形</c>的能力，因此能在不被敌人发现的情况下监视敌军的一举一动。先进的感应器使其可以发挥<c val="FFFF00">侦测</c>作用，找到<c val="FFFF00">隐形</c>和<c val="FFFF00">潜地</c>的敌方单位。侦测器没有攻击能力，隐形是它们唯一的生存保障。侦测器可以在<c val="FFFF00">机械台</c>中折跃。 /// Scout flyer -- <c val="FFFF00">Observers </c>are the Protoss eye in the sky. They are <c val="FFFF00">Permanently Cloaked</c> so they can spy on enemy forces with impunity. They have advanced sensors that allow them to act as <c val="FFFF00">Detectors</c> and uncover <c val="FFFF00">Cloaked</c> and <c val="FFFF00">Burrowed</c> units. Observers have no attack, and they rely on stealth for their protection. You can warp in more Observers at the <c val="FFFF00">Robotics Facility</c>.

It has extremely powerful abilities like <c val="FFFF00">Mass Recall</c> and <c val="FFFF00">Vortex</c> as well as the ability to <c val="FFFF00">Cloak</c> nearby ground units and structures. A Mothership can target both ground and air units. There can only be one Mothership on the battlefield at a time. Should <c val="FFFF00">Artanis</c> fall, another Mothership can be warped in at the <c val="FFFF00">Nexus</c>.
